meanings.definition: Up to this time or point
meanings.sent1: She had never been hereto so excited before.
meanings.sent2: We have hereto always followed the same routine.
meanings.sent3: The cat had hereto never caught a mouse, but today was different.
meanings.sent4: The sun had hereto always set in the west, but today it rose in the east.
meanings.sent5: His dedication hereto had never wavered, even in the face of adversity.

meanings.sent1: Please sign your name hereto to finalize the contract.
meanings.sent2: He attached the appendix hereto for your reference.
meanings.sent3: The dog tried to chew on the paper hereto, thinking it was a treat.
meanings.sent4: She glued the missing piece hereto, completing the puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The signature hereto sealed their commitment to the deal.
